name: Expose Weakness
description:
While this effect is active, Pure Electro Hypostasis's Revival Prism will take damage on their behalf.
(When the character takes Elemental Reaction DMG, the Revival Prism's Prismatic Energy will be expended. Concurrently, character will be immune to all damage.)
